name: xAct-contrib
tagline: Community contributions to the xAct tensor algebra package
body:
This is a collection of the community-contributed code for the **[xAct](http://xact.es/)** tensor algebra package for Mathematica, which can be [downloaded here](http://xact.es/download.html). The best place to go for questions is the [xAct mailing list](https://groups.google.com/forum/?#!forum/xact).
You can find our repositories at @xAct-contrib on github. If you have contributions, feel free to send pull requests.

Here you will find information on
* [How to use the xTension hooks to extend builtin functions](#using-xtension)
* [How to create a package to work with xAct](#creating-an-xact-package)
* [Ideas/wishes for future development](#ideaswishes-for-future-development)

### Contributions
The current list of contributions is:
* [Spinors](http://xact.es/Spinors/) from Alfonso García-Parrado with José M. Martín-García
* [SymManipulator](http://xact.es/SymManipulator/) from Thomas Bäckdahl
* [xtras](https://github.com/teake/xtras) from @teake (Teake Nutma)
* [TexAct](http://xact.es/TexAct/) from Thomas Bäckdahl, @barrywardell (Barry Wardell), with José M. Martín-García
* [xPand](http://www2.iap.fr/users/pitrou/xpand.htm) from Cyril Pitrou, Xavier Roy, and Obinna Umeh
